name: Bdtlib
body:
### Introduction
Course [webpage](http://www.cse.iitk.ac.in/users/purushot/courses/opt/2016-17-a/)

Course project : Library for bandit learning and optimization

The aim shall be to implement popular bandit learning algorithms, and more specifically focus on a usable and correct implementation
of [Thompson Sampling](http://jmlr.csail.mit.edu/proceedings/papers/v28/agrawal13.pdf).

This site shall be updated sporadically with project work. 

### Authors and Contributors
Govind Gopakumar (@govg) and Abhishek Maheswari(@abhimahes).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
